sentences.sContent: Her performance contains a strong element of self-parody (= when someone makes fun of their own style ) .
sentences.sCn: 她的表演包含了强烈的自嘲元素。

remMethod.val: par(旁边) ＋ ody(=ode 唱) → 在旁边唱 → 拙劣的模仿

words.tran: 诙谐文作者；打油诗作者

trans.tranCn: 模仿滑稽作品, 拙劣的模仿
trans.tranOther: a piece of writing, music etc or an action that copies someone or something in an amusing way
